thread.title: GZA GeoEnvironmental Inc. promotes Bradford Roberts P.E. to Senior Principal
thread.title_full: GZA GeoEnvironmental Inc. promotes Bradford Roberts P.E. to Senior Principal | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: GZA GeoEnvironmental Inc. promotes Bradford Roberts P.E. to Senior Principal
text:
(MENAFN Press)  GZA GeoEnvironmental Inc. a leading environmental and geotechnical consulting firm announces that Bradford Roberts of Boston Massachusetts has been promoted to Senior Principal in the Norwood office. 
As Senior Principal within the Contractor Services Division Roberts provides management and oversight of approximately 30 engineers focused on supporting the engineering needs of the construction industry. With GZA since 1989 Roberts has more than 25 years of experience in dynamic testing and quality assurance methods for deep foundations
A graduate of the University of New Hampshire with a degree in Civil Engineering and a Master’s degree in Geotechnical Engineering from Northeastern University Roberts is a Professional Engineer in multiple states.  He is on the Board of Directors for the Foundation and Marine Contractor’s Association of New England a previous board member for Construction Industries of Massachusetts and was recently inducted as a Mole member.
Roberts has been a “Big Brother” for the past 29 years volunteering his time to help children realize their potential and build their future.
Originally from New Hampshire Roberts now lives in Boston with his wife Sue and their two daughters both currently attending the College of the Holy Cross.
 
About GZA
Founded in 1964 GZA GeoEnvironmental Inc. is a multi-disciplinary firm providing Environmental Geotechnical Ecological Water and Construction Management services.  GZA maintains corporate offices at 249 Vanderbilt Avenue Norwood MA 02062. The firm has over 550 employees and operates 27 offices in the New England Mid-Atlantic Great Lakes and Appalachian Regions of the United States. For additional information please call William Hadge CEO at 781-278-3801 or visit the company’s website at www.gza.com.
